org.opentcs.access.rmi

接口 RemoteKernelConnection

  • 所有已知子接口:
    KernelProxy
    已过时。 
    Use KernelServicePortalBuilder instead.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0")
public interface RemoteKernelConnection
    Provides methods for logging into and out of a remote kernel.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 接口和说明
      static class  RemoteKernelConnection.State
      已过时。 
      Defines the states in which a KernelProxy instance may be in.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 已过时的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      RemoteKernelConnection.State getConnectionState()
      已过时。 
      Returns this connection's state.
      void login()
      已过时。 
      Logs in with/establishes a connection to the remote kernel.
      void logout()
      已过时。 
      Logs out from/drops the connection to the remote kernel.

    • 方法详细资料

      • login

        void login()
    throws CredentialsException,
           KernelUnavailableException
        已过时。 
        Logs in with/establishes a connection to the remote kernel.
        抛出:
        CredentialsException - If the credentials used (user name and password) were not accepted by the remote kernel.
        KernelUnavailableException - If there was a problem logging in with the remote kernel.

      • logout

        void logout()
        已过时。 
        Logs out from/drops the connection to the remote kernel.

      • getConnectionState

        @Nonnull
RemoteKernelConnection.State getConnectionState()
        已过时。 
        Returns this connection's state.
        返回:
        This connection's state.
